mapper.select: SELECT st.no as no, sd_num, sd_name, sd_id, sd_birth, sd_phone, sd_address, sd_email, sd_date, su.s_num as s_num, s_name FROM student st INNER JOIN subject su ON st.s_num = su.s_num ORDER BY st.no

SELECT TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YY') || s_num || LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(sd_num,5))),0) + 1, 4, '0' ) as studentnumber FROM subject LEFT OUTER JOIN student USING(s_num) WHERE s_num = #{subjectNumber} GROUP BY s_num
SELECT NVL((SELECT 1 FROM student WHERE sd_id = #{studentId}), 0) as result FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student(no, sd_num, sd_name, sd_id, sd_passwd, s_num, sd_birth, sd_phone, sd_address, sd_email) VALUES(student_seq.nextval, #{studentNumber}, #{studentName}, #{studentId}, #{studentPasswd}, #{subject.subjectNumber}, #{studentBirth}, #{studentPhone}, #{studentAddress}, #{studentEmail})
